name: PD Artist 10
description:
The ideal and affordable graphics tool for all budding developers.

Ideal for independent developers, this highly affordable PC based digital art package packs a real punch, delivering everything needed to create stunning art and 3D terrains.

  • Digital painting with multiple brush types - natural media brushes, particle brushes, foliage brushes, custom image and animated brushes.
  • A huge collection of filters.
  • 3D capabilities including elevation map based 3D terrain generation, global illumination and ray tracing on CPU and in the GPU!

PD Artist 10 is part of a wider suite of Project Dogwaffle creative digital tools that deliver solutions for all needs, all abilities and all budgets. Here is the complete family:

  • PD Particles 9 – the basic entry package offering simple art creation tools.
  • PD Artist 10 - create stunning art and 3D terrains.
  • PD Howler – Includes everything from PD Artist 10, PD Particle 9 plus animations and video.
